entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
